wikipedia_page.main: Samantha Dorrance is a British actress, singer and dancer from Willenhall in the West Midlands who reached fame on Disney Channel UK. She played the lead role of Laura in both the UK Tour and West End versions of Dreamboats and Petticoats.

response: * Samantha Dorrance (born 1992), British actor and dancer

Matt Healy appeared as Captain Hook in Peter Pan at the Theatre Severn, Shrewsbury, Shropshire between December 2009 and January 2010. He appeared along with Disney Channel's icon Samantha Dorrance who played Wendy in the pantomime.

| Laura || Samantha Dorrance || Samantha Dorrance || Liz Carter

On 10 December 2012, a single "Onesie Time" was released on iTunes, co-written by Ribi, and featuring his vocals, along with those of other notable names such as West End performers Samantha Dorrance (Dreamboats and Petticoats), Sabrina Aloueche (We Will Rock You), Tim Driesen (Rock of Ages) and Christopher Biggins, collectively dubbed 'The West End Onesie Club' - all performers wore onesies throughout the recording process.
